string.value: Mokutekichi ni iku ni wa kono kichi o toorinukenakereba narimasen. Kyoohaku-teki ni miemasu.
Watashi wa mokuhyoo o tassei dekimasendeshita... Demo shiawase wa totemo kanoode, totemo chikadzuite imashita...
Kono torakku o shitte iru yoona ki ga shimasu. Kono kigoo, doko ka de mita koto ga aruЕ.
Soo, Iwan Guo no kurumadesu! Motto kuwashiku mite miru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Kare no karada wa nakaniha naku, tsumari kare wa toho o tsudzuketa to iu kotoda.
Kare wa sudeni hijoo ni chikadzuite imasu. Naze watashi wa kono sakini nani ga matte iru no ka o osorete iru nodesu ka?
Kuso! Koko wa ittai nanina nda?
Kono hito-tachi zen'in wa daredesu ka?
Ima dewa kagaku-sha ga nani o hanashite ita no ka rikai dekimashita.
Koko no hitobito o hiki tsukeru mono wa nanideshou ka? Mada hozon dekiru baai wa doosureba yoidesu ka?
Kuso, kono sanzoku wa nan-ri iru nda! Soshite motto motto!
KENSA GISHI|Koko wa totemo kikendesu. Saa, koko kara tsuredashimasu.
Anatahadaredesu ka? Mada ichi-ride wa kakae kirenaiЕ issho ni iru yo!
Ore wa dokoni mo ikanee. Karera wa satsujin-shada! Watashitachi wa karera to chikara o awasete tatakawanakereba narimasen.
KENSA GISHI|Watashitachi no tasuke ga nakereba, hitori de karera o taosu koto wa dekimasen. Ikitainara foroo shite kudasai.
Modotte kite, kono satsujin-sha-tachi ni shikaeshi shite yaru!
Pureeto ni temaneki suru chikara o kanjimasu.
Motto hayaku! Kono kuruma wa nanto yukkuri to kaiten suru nodeshou ka. Maa, soreha jigokudesu!
Tomaranaikedo aruku no mo tsuraku natte kitaЕ
Kuso... Watashi... Dame... Moo... Ugokanai...
KENSA GISHI|Gunji kichi no mawari o an'nai shimashou.
Naze mawarimichi o suru nodeshou ka? Kore de karera to tatakau junbi ga dekimashita! Issho ni karera o taoshimashou!
KENSA GISHI|Koofun shinaide kudasai. Anata ni wa shimei, juuyoona shimei ga ari, soreni zenryoku o shuuchuu shinakereba narimasen.
Wakarimashita. Michi o shimeshite kudasai.
Kono eria o hanaretaidesu ka?

Izen no ooku no hito-tachi to onajiyooni, anata mo soosu ni chikadzuki sugite, sono chikara ni nomikoma rete shimaimashita. Soshite, hitobito ga atarashii hiiroo o dorekurai matanakereba naranai ka wa darenimo wakarimasen...
